FuncDef: The reset traffic-behavior log cache origin command clears log cache information on a board in a specified slot in the original flow cache.
CLIs: reset traffic-behavior log cache origin slot <slot-id>
Examples: [~HUAWEI] reset traffic-behavior log cache origin slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To re-collect the traffic statistics, run the reset traffic-behavior log cache origin command to clear log cache information on a board in a specified slot in the original flow cache. The flows whose cache information is cleared are immediately aged and logged.
